about_the_game:
The Romans are fleeing Britain. The foreign stain, once ubiquitous throughout the land, has been relegated to pockets of resistance dotted through the isles. Four centuries of Pax Romana has caused the ancient warring factions to become weak and divided. It is time to rise up and claim this land once more, as your ancestors did before the Eagles came.

Soul Invictus is a voxel survival game where parties of powerful heroes fight to defend their homelands from marauding barbarians and enemy factions in ancient warring Britain. Craft weapons, build villages into sprawling towns and protect your fledgling nation by leading your armies to war!

Key Features:
  • Play historical story campaigns or sandbox adventures, blending procedural open world gameplay with choice-based story-telling
  • Choose your class and learn new abilities as the world grows around you
  • Grow your camp into a village, gain territory, settle new areas and expand your faction into a fledgling nation-state
  • Nurture your subjects. Their daily contributions to village life keep the world vibrant whether you are playing on your own or with friends.
  • Undertake randomised quests, wave-defence and side objectives that keep the action unpredictable, even in Campaign mode.
  • Gain rewards for exploration, trade and cultural development that allow you to develop your character out of combat and play the way you want to.

Campaign Mode

A story mode, rich with dialogue where choices matter, tells the separate tales of faction leaders surviving in an era of war and strife.

  • Campaign 1 Visions of Camelot: A young Briton slave and a travelling Christian nun make an unlikely alliance to defend a local burial site from grave robbers. The location of their camp attracts new pilgrims and vagrants who band together to build a haven that is fated to protect itself from retreating Roman forces, roving barbarians, enemy feudal kings and the new, deadly Saxon threat.
  • Campaign 2 Woad Warriors: Survive as a Pictish mother that has had her family torn from her by the Roman oppressors, taken as slaves to territories unknown. One day a journey to the Wall reveals your overlords have left without trace. Years of repression have grown a bitter vengeance in your heart. Gather the clans and burn a bloody warpath after the cowards. Bring a slaughter that makes the bones of Boudicca dance in her ancient grave.

Sandbox Mode

A mode that lets you grow your own nation in a procedurally generated open-world Britain. Play on your own, with or against friends. As host you will have control of a range of customisable world settings. Choose to include game objectives, barbarian tribes, and NPC nations or add restrictions such as limiting technology advances. Build a world that your nation can nurture, or gear up your armies and watch it all burn!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: 2.6 GHz Quad Core or similar
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 950 or Radeon HD 7970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: i5 3GHz or Ryzen 5 3GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
